title: Screen
description: four-panel folding screen (by?bu); embroidery on silk; obverse: roosters in the fall rice harvest; reverse: monkeys in the cherry blossoms and the young monkeys beside the stream with crab and rushes; all heavily and beautifully embroidered lifelike; the title of old favorite fable Saru Kani Gakksen; in the style of Sosen
creditline: Given in memory of Henry Dutton Thrall
